item.title: Roblox: Hair Cutting Simulator Codes (June 2024)
item.description:
Hair Cutting Simulator is a simple and fun clicker with the popular "Rebirth" mechanic used in many other Roblox games. Here, you play the role of a hairdresser and have to strengthen your skills to compete for trophies against boss NPCs. Strengthening your hairdressing skills is relatively easy. You just need to click on the screen constantly, but it still takes quite a bit of time.

Of course, you can use the "Rebirth" option to start the game from scratch and get sure buffs to help you progress faster, but redeeming Hair Cutting Simulator codes will also be a nice bonus for your development. Codes offer generous rewards that will be useful, so take advantage of this opportunity.

All Hair Cutting Simulator Codes

Working Hair Cutting Simulator Codes

  • Release - Redeem this code to get 100 Wins.

Expired Hair Cutting Simulator Codes

There are no expired Hair Cutting Simulator codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to ensure you get all the rewards.

If you are a beginner, redeeming Hair Cutting Simulator codes will be a significant boost to start and help you develop much faster. Each code offers generous rewards from the developers, such as Wins, the trophies that will put you on the leaderboard, and also serve as currency to buy pets.

How to Redeem Codes in Hair Cutting Simulator

Hair Cutting Simulator code redemption system is simple and is quite often used in other clickers on the Roblox platform. But, if you have never done it before or have forgotten how to redeem Hair Cutting Simulator codes, follow the next steps:

  • Launch Hair Cutting Simulator .
  • Pay attention to the right side of the screen. There will be many buttons with different icons. Among them, interact with the one that says Codes and the icon with the verification symbol.
  • This will open the redemption menu. Below it, there will be an input field and a green Verify button. Now, manually enter or copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the green Verify button to submit your rewards request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification with a list of rewards received will appear below the redemption menu.

Games Like Hair Cutting Simulator

The core gameplay loop of Hair Cutting Simulator , where players perform repetitive actions to earn in-game currency and upgrade their skills, is a mechanic familiar to many Roblox games. This "grind and upgrade" style is well-known for its addictive nature and sense of progression. If you enjoy the mechanics and style of Hair Cutting Simulator , you might also find these Roblox games appealing:

  1. Push a Car! - Push a car to earn strength and unlock new areas.
  2. Type Race Simulator - Type quickly to race against others and upgrade your typing speed.
  3. Catch a Fish Simulator - Cast your line, catch fish, and sell them for better equipment.

item.title: World of Warcraft Makes Massive Change to Cloak of Infinite Potential
item.description:
Highlights

  • The latest WoW hotfix has raised the Cloak of Infinite Potential cap to 10 million, making players crazy powerful.
  • Mists of Pandaria Remix offers a unique experience without raid stress, letting players go wild with power.
  • Some players are unhappy with Blizzard's balance changes in the event and hope for cheaper gear upgrades.

The latest World of Warcraft hotfix has dramatically raised the attribute cap for the Cloak of Infinite Potential, allowing players to reach even greater levels of power. While Mists of Pandaria Remix was designed to be a bridge between the final Dragonflight patch and The War Within , the event has been positively received by the World of Warcraft community as its own thing. It allowed players to experience one of the best World of Warcraft expansions without stressing too much about raid performance or class balance.

The main appeal in Mists of Pandaria Remix is the Cloak of Infinite Potential, as it allows any player to become absurdly overpowered. This has allowed classes such as Monk to clear a World of Warcraft dungeon in 50 seconds, break the number cap on a Guardian Druid, or even kill essential NPCs well before their time. However, despite being called the Cloak of Infinite Potential, its stats were capped to a rather finite value of 200,000.

In a recent hotfix reported by Wowhead, this limit has been raised from 200,000 to a whopping 10 million, which players will no doubt struggle to reach. The new 10 million cap applies to all stats on the Cloak of Infinite Potential, and it should be noted that Blizzard has no plans to reduce the upgrade cost on gear in Mists of Pandaria Remix. The end date for the event is August 19, 2024, and many World of Warcraft players strongly suspect that the next expansion will release shortly after.

Should Blizzard Nerf Gear Upgrade Costs in Mists of Pandaria Remix?

Though obtaining Bronze in Mists of Pandaria Remix can be a hassle, the World of Warcraft community has rediscovered old farming methods to make the grind less grueling. A key criticism of the event has been Blizzard's willingness to nerf these farming methods in order to stagger the acquisition of cosmetics and gear upgrades. While the developers should strive to keep the gameplay balanced, some players argue that Mists of Pandaria Remix was billed as a temporary event – one that didn't care about balance, and instead was about letting fans go wild.

The game of whack-a-mole between developers and the community in Mists of Pandaria Remix has soured the mood of some players, who feel that Blizzard is making too many changes to a game mode that is meant to be short-lived. While raising the limit on the Cloak of Infinite Potential is a step in the right direction, World of Warcraft fans are still hoping that Blizzard reconsiders its stance on whether gear upgrades should be cheaper. After all, every single Mists of Pandaria Remix character will have their inventories wiped on August 19, and their Cloak of Infinite Potential will be retired.

item.title: Squad Busters: How To Play With Friends
item.description:
The developers at Supercell, the team behind popular mobile games such as Clash Royale and Clash of Clans , have released a new game along the same wavelength as their other popular titles called Squad Busters. The game challenges players to collect new characters to collect as they attempt to collect more gems than their adversaries by looting crates, cutting down trees, and defeating other players and AI.

While Squad Busters is a game that can easily be enjoyed solo, it is also very accessible for those who enjoy gaming with their friends. If you want to know how to play Squad Busters with friends , then this guide will show you how to invite them to your party and play competitively together.

How to Add Friends in Squad Busters

Inviting friends to join in on the action in Squad Busters is a relatively easy process in this party-friendly mobile game, which means you can jump in on the action sooner rather than later. To add a friend to your profile, simply tap on the Friends button at the bottom of the screen from the Home Page. This will open a pop-up window where you can view your friends list and any pending invites, as well as a button to Add Friends.

Players will have two options to add friends to their Squad Busters account, either by scanning their friend's QR code, or by adding them via their player ID . The player ID can be found either from the Add Friends page, or by tapping on the Player Profile section in the top-left corner of the screen. Once the QR code has been scanned or ID entered, your friend will be sent an invitation and will be added to your friends list upon acceptance.

How to Invite Friends To Your Party in Squad Busters

In addition to adding friends in Squad Busters , players can also create or join a party to ensure they are in the same matches as their friends. Much like the Friends tab, you can manage your party by selecting the Party Up! button at the bottom of the screen . This will give you two options, to either create your own party or join one that is hosted by someone else.

If you opt to create a party, you can invite other players by sharing the party code at the bottom left of the screen, by providing the QR code for friends to scan, or by selecting the Share Party Invite! option, which will give you the ability to copy the party link and send it to a friend. In contrast, if you are joining someone else's party, you can enter it by entering the party code in the Join Party menu, scanning the QR code, or clicking on a link that is shared with you by the party host.

item.title: Roblox: Jujutsu Tycoon Codes (June 2024)
item.description:
Jujutsu Tycoon is another simulator on the Roblox platform, where your main quest is to build and develop your dojo. You can start by creating the fence, floor, walls, etc., but for this, you need a starting capital, and this is where Jujutsu Tycoon codes come to the rescue.

Each code listed below holds the key to free Cash, a valuable resource for purchasing new weapons, techniques, and advancing your dojo. However, these codes have a ticking clock, meaning an expiration date. So, don't wait, seize the opportunity and redeem them as quickly as you can to keep the excitement of your gameplay alive.

All Jujutsu Tycoon Codes

Developers regularly release new updates accompanied by new codes. Redeem them to get Cash, which is recommended to be spent on weapons and techniques, so you can kill a few starting bosses and get even more money. All the active Jujutsu Tycoon codes are listed below:

Working Jujutsu Tycoon Codes

  • YenUpdate - Redeem the code to get 30k Cash.
  • Quality - Redeem the code to get 30k Cash.
  • Update - Redeem the code to get 25k Cash.

Expired Jujutsu Tycoon Codes

  • Quality
  • MEGA
  • GojoBoss
  • Sukuna
  • DoctorAfrican
  • FirstCode
  • Gojo

How to Redeem Jujutsu Tycoon Codes

The developers of Jujutsu Tycoon decided not to complicate the process of redeeming codes, so, like in most other Roblox games, you can do it in a matter of seconds. Also, you don’t need to complete any tutorials or make any progress to get your freebies. All you have to do is follow the steps listed below:

  • Go to Roblox and launch Jujutsu Tycoon .
  • After you spawn in the game world, pay attention to the menu on the left.
  • Click on the very first button at the top of the menu. It has a Twitter icon on it.
  • Copy and paste or manually write one of the active codes listed above.

Cash will be credited to your account if no typos are made and the codes haven’t expired yet.

How to Get More Jujutsu Tycoon Codes

Like hundreds of other Roblox code articles on Gamerant, we regularly update this one to ensure that all the listed codes are up-to-date. Therefore, the most convenient option for you is to bookmark this guide. Also, you can follow the developer’s official Discord channel to get all the latest news, codes and updates, and just stay in touch with the game community or find friends to play the experience together.

item.title: Zombie.io Codes (June 2024)
item.description:
Zombie.io is made in the style of Vampire Survivors and it invites players to join the hunt for various zombies. However, your survival depends not only on the abilities you gain but also on your equipment and stats. Upgrading them is pretty tricky, especially in the early stages of the game. Therefore, this guide will provide you with Zombie.io codes that will help you out.

Joy Nice Games occasionally adds codes with valuable rewards to the game. These include Diamonds, Keys, and more. But of course, they are active for a limited time.

All Zombie.io Codes

The central part of Zombie.io gameplay consists of Stages in which you have to fight zombie enemies and bosses. However, to progress, players will need to invest quite a lot of time, since gear plays a key role. To upgrade them, you need Banknotes and Blueprints, which are difficult to farm. And to speed this up, you should use Zombie.io codes.

Each of these codes can offer you several different rewards. In other words, using several of them can make your character much more substantial. For your convenience, we have collected all the working codes in Zombie.io below.

Active Codes

  • jdoctor - 5 Basic Keys, 2 Shoes Blueprints, 6 Glove Blueprints, 2 Necklace Blueprints, 3 Weapon Blueprints, 3 Helmet Blueprints, and Clothing Blueprint.
  • ptst3333 - 2 Advanced Keys and 100 Diamonds.
  • ptst2000 - 5 Basic Keys, 3 Shoes Blueprints, 3 Glove Blueprints, 8 Necklace Blueprints, 4 Weapon Blueprints, Helmet Blueprint, and Clothing Blueprint.
  • zombtop1 - 5 Basic Keys, 3 Shoes Blueprints, 3 Necklace Blueprints, 3 Weapon Blueprints, Clothing Blueprint, and 100 Diamonds.
  • zbft3000 -5 Advanced Keys and 50,000 Banknotes.
  • launchday - 5 Shoes Blueprints, Necklace Blueprint, 2 Weapon Blueprints, 2 Clothing Blueprints, 200 Diamonds and 10,000 Banknotes

Expired Codes

  • zombio24pst
  • zbshooting24
  • newZombie
  • 24M3POTATO
  • PTST2000
  • 333ZMBVSPT
  • potato24st
  • zom24bieio
  • FIGHT3ZOMB
  • Zombie888
  • zombie777
  • US9999
  • welcome999
  • US8888
  • US7777

How to Redeem Zombie.io Codes

Unlike similar titles, Zombie.io codes are not available to you from the beginning of the game. This feature is only unlocked after you clear Stage 5. So, be prepared for the fact that it will take a lot of time. Even though this can still be called part of the tutorial, you will have to farm a lot of Banknotes to level up enough gear. Once this condition is met, follow these steps to redeem Zombie.io codes:

  • Click on your profile icon in the upper left corner.
  • Click Redeem Codes.
  • Finally, enter one of the codes above to claim your free rewards.

Zombie.io is available on mobile.
